dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Hey Lucci...w-what are you doing here?

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I figured I would find out what exactly it is that she wanted.

dialogue.name: Lucci
dialogue.dialogueText: I’m here to see you of course, my destined one.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I felt my heart start to race. The way this girl is looking at me is incredibly...dedicated, as if she wanted something from me that only I could provide.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I better let her know that whatever she thinks is going to happen...well it won’t.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Listen Lucci, I don’t think I am your destined-

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: My hand started to itch again and my words seemed to stop.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: It also appears Lucci didn’t hear at all.

dialogue.name: Lucci
dialogue.dialogueText: Anyway my destined one, I was thinking how about we work on getting that baby thing sorted out today?

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: There is no way in hell I could’ve heard her correctly! No way at all!

dialogue.name: Lucci
dialogue.dialogueText: You know? We could go and find a quiet spot nearby, just us two...and get to work.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Lucci’s eyes looked very seductively at me.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Wait a minute, is this really going to happen!?
